solution_line_template: First find the total cook time for the steaks: {num_steaks} steaks * {time_per_steak} minutes/steak = <<{num_steaks}*{time_per_steak}={total_steak_time}>>{total_steak_time} minutes

Then add the waffles' cook time to find the total cook time: {total_steak_time} minutes + {time_per_waffles} minutes = <<{total_steak_time}+{time_per_waffles}={total_cook_time}>>{total_cook_time} minutes
